topic.title: Creating a Proxy, Account, Container Cluster

body.p: Create a cluster for Swift proxy, account, container servers as follows:

ul.li: Identity the control plane that the object serves are associated with (usually data/control_plane.yml)
Identity the node type/role used by Swift Object servers. In this document, we have used ROLE_SWPAC

Add an entry to the clusters item in the control-plan as follows:control-planes: - name: ccp region: region1 . . . clusters: . . . - id: "4" name: swpac server-role: ROLE-SWPAC member-count: 3 allocation-policy: strict service-components: - ntp-client - swift-proxy - swift-account - swift-container - swift-ring-builder - swift-client
